overview: The fun continues with 8 beautiful thick asses gettin' oiled. Watered and smashed down. Newcomers galore! First timer Maryann is sweet 18 and Nathan shows why he's a threat. Meagan is tall, big and has the face of a queen. And Julia, beautiful young and 18, with a big big round juicy ass that will make your mouth hang open! And much much much more!
title: Big Butt Smash Down 4
